name: VR Alien Planet
description:
This is a walktrough on an Alien planet environment developed for Android and WINDOWS , for android after instaling it , use your Vr glasses with your smartphone , the resolution of the graphics isvery High and the stereo sound will immerse you in a virtual environment and an exceptional experience .

  • This is a Walktrough in an Imaginary planet using VR Glasses and headphones.
  • This simulation is created for a total immersion in an Virtual and beatiful environment.

- For the windows file just download the compressed file , decompressed it and click on the executable file named " Walktrough alien planet.exe "

I hope you will enjoy this Walktrough and please leave comments to

motivate me to continue to develope next versions.

Thanks
